items.summary: Replace read-only date displays in the journey edit modal with interactive calendar popovers matching the 'Add New Journey' form implementation, allowing users to select new start and end dates
Add time selection controls to the journey edit modal for both start time and end time, using the same Select components with hour and minute dropdowns as the Add New Journey form

Implement validation in the journey edit modal to ensure all existing schedule items fall within the newly selected journey date range, displaying a clear error message if any schedule items would fall outside the updated period
Update the backend updateJourney function call in the edit modal to include the modified startDate, endDate, and time fields, ensuring the revised journey period is persisted correctly
